price: Ne ia treguam atij (Faraonit) të gjitha shenjat Tona, por ai i mohoi, nuk pranoi (të besonte)
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
